name: I/O Extended planning
description: Meetup to plan upcoming GDG Douala I/O Extended (venue, agenda, budget, ...)

name: I/O Extended 2017 Douala

venue.name: ActivSpaces
venue.address_2: 1er Etage Immeuble AppsTech, Face Douala Stock Exchange

description:
Event Summary

Google I/O Extended event is focused on bringing the local developer community in Douala together to experience the keynote and other main Google I/O sessions a few weeks later after. It also includes other activities targeted to developers such as hackathon and codelab sessions.

Overall objective of the event

The overall objective would be to try stimulate and raise developers, students, IT professionals and curious minds in the community, to introduce them to the latest Google technologies by giving hands on experience through keynotes, codelabs and interactive talks, and thus drive the next generation of developers onwards and upwards

Target Audience

• Developers

• Enthusiast

• Tech Entrepreneurs

• Students

name: GDD Europe 2017 Extended - Douala
description:
https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/Cv-KRDo2MgPjQ5QKSsGywgbB4urlni67dR4cEFZtWu4TqmOmKOh2Hn6XBFjoCEd8Y9u117OCXIHddAwscBp-6HR65X9mMQ=s688

Google Developer Days (GDD) are global events showcasing the latest developer products and platforms from Google to help you quickly develop high quality apps, grow & retain an active user base, and tap into tools to earn more. Learn about Google latest updates to Android, the Mobile Web, Firebase, Machine Learning, Cloud, IoT and Design.

This meetup is an extended event in Douala to bring the local community together to experience talks and view the keynotes. Local content (product demos, hackathons, codelabs) are also scheduled and video records on DVD will be made available to all participants.

AGENDA:
09:00 AM Registration & Welcome Coffee
10:00  AM Introduction to PRODUCT1 (TBD)
10:40  AM alk: TOPIC1 (TBD) 
11:20   AM Introduction to PRODUCT2 (TBD) 
12:00  PM Lunch time
01:30  PM Local Products DEMO session
02:10  PM What's new on PRODUCT3 (TBD) 
02:50 PM Talk: TOPIC2 (TBD) 
03:30 PM Hands on session: CODELAB1 (TBD) 
04:10  PM Hands on session: CODELAB2 (TBD) 
05:00 PM Closing & After Party

Event Tags: #GDDEurope #Douala

name: DevFest Douala 17
description:
GDG DevFest 17 is our annual all-day developer conference that offers speaker sessions across multiple product areas, codelabs, hackathon and more!

This year we are targetting 4 concurrents sessions tracks and many more communities to participate.

AGENDA:
9:00 AM Registration & Welcome Coffee

10:00 AM Parallel Sessions 1
10:50 AM Parallel Sessions 2
11:40 AM Parallel Sessions 3
12:30 PM Lunch time
1:30 PM Parallel Sessions 4
2:00 PM Parallel Sessions 5
2:50 PM Parallel Sessions 6
3:40 PM Parallel Sessions 7
4:30 PM Coffee Break / Networking
5:00 PM Closing & Happy Hour

name: Android Study Jam Douala 2019

venue.name: ActivSpaces
venue.address_2: 1er Etage Immeuble AppsTech, Face Douala Stock Exchange

description:
L'Android Study Jam est une formation organisée par le GDG Douala. Le contenu est issu d'un cours en Android du site udacity.com qui est une plateforme de E-learning developée en partenariat avec Google

Le Android Study Jam Douala 2019 vise à former un maximum de personnes à la technologie Android, qui en fin février 2019 tourne 74.15%(source: statcounter.com) des smartphones dans le monde, 82.42% en afrique et 80.14% au Cameroun.

Dans un contexte où l'innovation est avérée, devenir professionel dans le developpement de la technologie sur laquelle plus de 80% des potentiels utilisateurs consommerons cette innovation est presque une garrantie de devenir soi-même un acteur de l'innovation, d'autant plus que cette formation sera entièrement gratuite!

Si vous êtes étudiant en informatique ou simple passionné des TIC ? Le développement d'applications vous intéresse ? Vous êtes un innovateur ? Vous bloquez toujours au moment de la réalisation ? Vous êtes un développeur professionnel désireux d'ajouter Android à sa bagatelle ? Cette formation est pour vous!
how_to_find_us: Dites 'Imeuble Socar Akwa' à la moto ou au taxi de n'importe où dans Douala.
